item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! My name is Amit Kumar-Hermosillo. I am a computer engineering student at Olin College. Most recently, I’ve worked as a software development engineer intern at Amazon, overhauling the full stack for the primary inventory compliance management tool used to search and suppress defective inventories, making the UI easier to use and more robust to inadvertent error and adding new action types that mitigate prior causes of or inventory leakage.
